definition: to lend on interest/to borrow/a loan/leniency/to make excuses/to pardon/to forgive

sentences.english: We will give the criminal offenders shot shrift.
sentences.chinese: 我們對那些刑事罪犯將嚴懲不貸。

sentences.english: If our enemy dare to attack us, we'll punish them severely and crush them into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 敵人膽敢來犯，我們一定嚴懲不貸，打它個粉身碎骨。

sentences.english: We should be tough with criminals and show no mercy to them.
sentences.chinese: 對於犯罪分子就要嚴懲不貸，不能留情。
